revised_title: A Comprehensive Review of the Renin-Angiotensin System
tldr: This article provides a historical and comprehensive review of the renin-angiotensin system, discussing the enzyme renin, its substrate, and the pressor activity called angiotensin. The author covers the development of knowledge about the system, its components, and its role in blood pressure regulation, vasoconstriction, and aldosterone secretion. The article also discusses the methods of measuring renin and angiotensin in body fluids and the factors affecting their secretion.
